projects.name: BookWebStore
projects.description: An immersive ASP.NET-based bookstore ecommerce website offering a user-friendly platform to explore, purchase, and discover a vast collection of books.

projects.name: MovieHub
projects.description: A dynamic movie streaming website, crafted with HTML, CSS, and ASP.Net Blazor, providing an engaging interface for users to track latest movies released and search .

projects.name: SwordFight
projects.description: A Simple Two Player offline sword fight game using HTML, CSS and Vanilla Javascript.
